name: Bloom Prima the Melodious Choir
effectText:
1 "Melodious Maestra" monster + 1+ "Melodious" monsters
Gains 300 ATK for each material used for its Fusion Summon. This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. If this Fusion Summoned card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Melodious" monster in your GY; add it to your hand.
